entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
